actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: Resolution to establish an Office of Small Business Economic and Financial Analysis for the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Chairman of the Federal Reserve Board shall take into account the health of the small business sector in making any of its decisions.

titles.title: Resolution to establish an Office of Small Business Economic and Financial Analysis for the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.
